# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

where words are longer than the text width, such that you can justify your implementation choices.

```julia-repl
julia> wrap_string("This is a very long sentence.")
"This is\na very\nlong\nsentence."

julia> wrap_string("This is a very long sentence.", 15)
"This is a\nvery long\nsentence."
```
